trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Rochester
There were no other sightings in Rochester on or around April 8th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home after dinner and we were in sight of our house. When werounded the corner There were many bright lights that all seemed to be a part ofsome craft. It looked exactly like an airplane with its lights on,without theairplane, but it just hovered therefor about a minute.We were all calm. Thenjust as we turned at the intersection we had stopped at the object took off andIt flew away in an upward curved direction with a heavy bank to it. When turnedon its side in its turn I saw the triangle shape. The flat bottom of thetriangle was the front and the point was the back. It dissapered quickly.
